title: The A-Team
creator: Stephen J. Cannell, Frank Lupo
summary: A group of Vietnam War veterans, wrongly accused of a crime, becomes a team of mercenaries who help those in need while on the run from the military police.

title: Knight Rider
creator: Glen A. Larson
summary: A high-tech car, KITT, and its driver, Michael Knight, fight crime and injustice while battling against evil organizations and villains.

title: The Cosby Show
creator: Bill Cosby
summary: The Huxtable family, led by Dr. Cliff Huxtable, deals with the ups and downs of family life and parenting.

title: Cheers
creator: Glen Charles, Les Charles, James Burrows
summary: The regulars of a Boston bar called Cheers share laughs, love, and life while dealing with their own personal and professional challenges.

title: Miami Vice
creator: Anthony Yerkovich
summary: Two detectives, James 'Sonny' Crockett and Ricardo 'Rico' Tubbs, fight drug trafficking in the glamorous but dangerous world of Miami.

title: Family Ties
creator: Gary David Goldberg
summary: A family with liberal parents and a conservative son navigates the challenges of generational differences.

title: Magnum, P.I.
creator: Donald P. Bellisario, Glen A. Larson
summary: Private investigator Thomas Magnum solves cases in Hawaii while living a laid-back and adventurous lifestyle.

title: Dynasty
creator: Richard and Esther Shapiro
summary: The wealthy Carrington family and their rivals engage in power struggles, betrayals, and drama in the world of high society.

title: Dallas
creator: David Jacobs
summary: The Ewing family, owners of a large Texas oil company, faces conflicts and rivalries in both business and personal matters.

title: MacGyver
creator: Lee David Zlotoff
summary: Resourceful secret agent Angus MacGyver uses his scientific knowledge to solve problems and combat threats.
